main.name: Darian
main.occupation: full stack web developer that puts an emphasis on design
main.description: I love generating ideas, solving problems, and making things happen!
main.bio: I have always taken an interest in technology and I'm passionate about using it creatively to improve lives and our community. I find fufillment in motivating and inspiring others to grow and succeed and I believe there is nothing more powerful than being your authentic self. When I'm not coding, you can find me camping, hiking, mountain biking, practicing yoga, writing, reading, tending to my plants, or traveling.

resume.skillmessage: As a recent coding boot camp grad, with a background in biomedical engineering and information technology, I'm obsessed with learning and am always expanding this list! Below are some my most frequently used tools.
